SEARCH
Package antcolony.data

Class ColonyStats

java.lang.Object
antcolony.data.ColonyStats
public class ColonyStats extends Object
Maintains the vital statistics of a specific colony.

This class operates on a double-buffering system: it accumulates temporary data during the simulated day and, at midnight, archives this data for display in the graphical interface, resetting the counters for the following day.

  • Method Details

    • registerFood

      public void registerFood()
      Records the collection of one food unit. Increments the temporary counter.

    • registerBirth

      public void registerBirth()
      Records the birth of a new ant. Increments the temporary counter.

    • registerDeath

      public void registerDeath()
      Records the death of an ant. Increments the temporary counter.

    • endOfDay

      public void endOfDay()
      Finalizes the daily statistics cycle.

      This method should be called by WorldTime at midnight (00:00). It transfers temporary values to daily records and clears the accumulators for the new day.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all colony statistics.

      Clears both current accumulators and historical records. Should be called when the simulation is restarted by the user.
